channel.title: Suggestion for the update coming up
channel.description:
Pretender: -Objects have been changed. Pretender only need to become king. -Ballot Mixing (Day) : Can use during trial. -Family Matter (Night) : Discover player class type if they are Royal Blood. -Kinslayer (Night): Can no longer target king, but target will be unhealable Reaper: -Start with 3 souls instead of 2 -Replace Circle Of Death with SoulSteal Circle (Night) +SoulSteal Circle (Night): Everyone visiting your target will be Reaped, being unhealable. Reaper will know how many people got attacked and how many souls he got from that (not bypass night immunity) - Cost 3 souls to use. Regain 1 soul if no one visited your target or failed to use (Prevented, Occ,etc).
Pls check there and make a think about update.

item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Yeah agreed, the pretender win condition imo is pretty flaud. How does a person expect them to survive as neutral king with no guards. They basically have to go against the blue dragon and unseen / cult.

Becoming king as pretender is hard enough, yet the game requires them to survive as king. To solve this issue make a king called pretender king, that only has to become king and gets extra gold or an extra incentive to win as neutral king but that shouldn’t cost them the game because with no gaurds they are easy to get rid of.
